name: Finale
description:
Finale is an asynchronous multiplayer game for two players.  You control one of two characters: a mysterious wanderer trapped in a thick sandstorm, or a guiding spirit that can illuminate a path for the wanderer to follow as they retrace the steps of two lovers in exile.

How to play: 

  • Player One/The Wanderer can move around using either the arrow keys or WASD.
  • Player Two/The Guiding Spirit can move the cursor around with the mouse and "paint" on the screen using Left Click.

Production credits:

  • Ben Nguyen - Programming, Original Concept
  • Christopher Cannon - Art
  • Matthew Mace - Level Design
  • Raleigh "Benton" Steele - Narrative
